description:
Patagonia managed to make the classic cotton sweatshirt even better. Made from 100% Regenerative Organic Certified cotton, this shirt’s fabric comes from farms that adhere to the highest standard of organic farming. This soft organic cotton jumper does its part to keep future generations comfortable.

  • ROC™ cotton aims to rehabilitate soil, respect animal welfare and improve the lives of farmers. ROC farms reduce greenhouse gas emissions and could help trap more carbon than conventional agriculture
  • Organic cotton wears well and feels great
  • Taped shoulder seams are more comfortable and improve fit retention
  • Relaxed fit has a casual comfort
name: Patagonia Regenerative Organic Certified Cotton Essential Top - Women's
